title: Did Leonardo da Vinci travel? If so, where? - Quora

response.answer_text: He went where there was work. His travels were mainly in northern Italy which was not the unified country we know today. It was a patchwork of small localized city-state style fiefdoms not necessarily warring with each other but not necessarily co-operating either. His main occupation was that of a theatrical designer but it appears his main value was his thought processes and curiosity which he pressed upon his employers. Florence and Milan were two centers for him and late in his life he moved to France which is where he died,The new biography by Isaacson is well researched and well worth the read.
Actually. he died in the France king franois's arm. There is a painting called Death of Leonardo da Vinc, Painted by the great Ingres.  And I think that's why people consider him as guy.
